pros: Greatly value the product as well as the people that make Cockroach Labs such an amazing place to work. An additional factor is the founders. All three founders come from a history of contributing to the open source world – two of the founders created the GIMP from their dorm room in 1995. This lends to a culture that is open, transparent, where individuals can self-manage and are held accountable for the work they do. Also, solid work/life balance with dedicated 20% time called Free Fridays.
